  • Constructor Details

    • Assembler

      public Assembler(String code)
      Constructs an Assembler object with the given assembly code.
      Parameters:
      code - The assembly code to be assembled.

  • Method Details

    • getAssemblyCode

      private String getAssemblyCode(String textSection, DataInitializer dataInitializer)
      Retrieves the assembly code along with initialized data declarations.
      Parameters:
      textSection - The text section of the assembly code.
      dataInitializer - The data initializer object.
      Returns:
      The assembled assembly code.

    • assemble

      public void assemble()
      Assembles the assembly code into binary code. Iterates over each instruction, decodes it, and appends its corresponding binary representation. Skippable instructions containing labels are ignored during assembly.

    • getInstructions

      public String[][] getInstructions()
      Retrieves the assembled instructions along with their binary representations.
      Returns:
      A 2D array containing instruction index, binary code, and assembly instruction.

    • removeComments

      private String removeComments(String assemblyCode)
      Removes comments from the assembly code.
      Parameters:
      assemblyCode - The assembly code with comments.
      Returns:
      The assembly code without comments.

    • getProcessor

      public Processor getProcessor()
      Retrieves the processor associated with the assembler.
      Returns:
      The processor object.

    • getSymbols

      public String[][] getSymbols()
      Retrieves symbols declared in the assembly code.
      Returns:
      A 2D array containing symbols and their corresponding addresses.

    • getBinaryCode

      public String getBinaryCode()
      Retrieves the binary code generated from assembly code.
      Returns:
      The binary code.

    • getDebugCode

      public String getDebugCode()
      Retrieves the debug code containing assembly instructions along with their binary representations.
      Returns:
      The debug code.

    • getCurrentInstruction

      public int getCurrentInstruction()
      Retrieves the current instruction index.
      Returns:
      The current instruction index.
